ygData.subject: Re: Hunting 46-50
ygData.msgSnippet: Jagged Pine has some nice drops, especially for rangers and druids. But one warning about JP is that some of the gnolls there are casters and can wreck your
ygData.messageBody:
Jagged Pine has some nice drops, especially for rangers and druids.
But one warning about JP is that some of the gnolls there are
casters and can wreck your day quickly. Also there is not a lot of
room to kite there, so it is mainly rangers you ever see there.

For druids at 46 I am sorry to say that other than GD, EW,
and "maybe" PoD, your kiting days for solo are just about over.
Time to get a group and have some fun.

Drago

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, Su <suceress@d...> wrote:
>
> I think Jaggedpine is actually attached to surefall glade. so if
you are kos
> in surefall you need to be careful. Also, even with a good
graphics card it
> can be fairly laggy there because of the type of graphics. I hear
there are
> some cool things that drop there though. Eye of the Griffon drops
there.
> It's +10 wisdom but -20 charisma, range slot item.
> luv,
> -Su
>
> try jagged pine......its between blackburrow and shurfall glen
